Posts.Content: From mpt33905 I had a lumpectomy, 5 months of chemo and 35 radiation to left breast. The tumoe was Triple Negative, lymph nodes negative..and then the radiation fibrosis as above..
Posts.Title: Radiation after-effects

Posts.Content: Yes! It is called radiation fibrosis. I take Trental (generic is Pentoxiflline) 400mg three x daily with a single dose daily of Vit E 400mg. It took about 6 months but the pain and hardness has resolved. Must continue to take!
Posts.Title: Radiation after-effects
